text:
Nokia 7.2 and Nokia 800 Tough arrive in Italy: the heir of 3310 already on Amazon for â‚¬ 123 (photo)
05 Nov 2019, 17:09 by Vincenzo Ronca
Two new Nokia smartphones arrive in our market, the Nokia 7.2 that we have seen in preview at the last IFA in Berlin and the new Nokia 800 Tough, a feature phone that makes resistance its flagship.
Nokia 7.2 is the new Android One from Nokia, we have already seen its full technical data sheet available in this article. The device arrives in the Italian market in the version with 6 GB of RAM and 128 GB of internal storage, at a price of â‚¬ 379.
The other novelty of Nokia consists of its new feature phone: Nokia 800 Tough that comes with KaiOS and that integrates several interesting features like LTE support, Google Assistant, Facebook and WhatsApp. Strength and solidity are its major strengths, so much so that it is a legitimate heir to the glorious Nokia 3310: the materials it is made of are MIL-STD-810G compliant, able to withstand temperatures between - 20 Â° C and 55 Â° C and different types of shocks and falls.
The new Nokia 800 Tough arrives in Italy in Black Steel and Desert Sand colors and is already available on Amazon Italy for â‚¬ 123.60.
